--- title: moraltopology keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "A library to model moral topology and the data pipeline around it" description: "A library to model moral topology and the data pipeline around it" nb_path: "index.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

This file will become your README and also the index of your documentation.

Install

pip install moraltopology

How to use

Start by creating a MoralTopology object with your name and data.

{% raw %} 
mt = MoralTopology(name="Vishal Bakshi", data={})
{% endraw %}

You can access the data with .data:

{% raw %} 
mt.data

{}
{% endraw %}

You can access your name with .name

{% raw %} 
mt.name

'Vishal Bakshi'
{% endraw %}

You can print your name (read-only) with .username()

{% raw %} 
mt.username()

'Vishal Bakshi'
{% endraw %}
